TEI.2.document_citation: Eugene Barker, ed., Annual Report of the American Historical Association for the Year 1922: The Austin Papers, (Washington, D.C.: Government Printing Office, 1928), 3 vols., Vol 2, pp. 88
TEI.2.document_title: Thomas M Duke to Ramon Musquiz, 08-06-1828

barker_notes.barker_summary: Thomas M. Duke to Ramon Musquiz, August 6, 1828. Gave necessary orders for militia to assist Austin. (Omitted.)
barker_notes.barker_citation: Eugene Barker, ed., Annual Report of the American Historical Association for the Year 1919: The Austin Papers, (Washington, D.C.: Government Printing Office, 1924), 3 vols., Vol 1, Part 2, pp. 88

text.body:
*div1 type="summary"* *p*Thomas M. Duke to Ramon Musquiz, August 6, 1828. Gave necessary orders for militia to assist Austin. (Omitted.)*/p* */div1*
*div1 type="body"*
*p**location_mentioned*San Felipe,*/location_mentioned* *date_mentioned n="08-06-1828">August 6, 1828,*/date_mentioned**/p* *p*See Calendar,*/p*
*/div1*
